plot outline: Models from India goes to Bangkok for ad shoot and gets kidnapped. Then, the same models returns back to Chennai as human bombs. Then, the undercover cop Jai Akash gets assigned to find out the culprits. In the meantime, hero gets in the wrong side of his friend Yogi Babu as he suspects that his wife Yazhini is having an affair with Jai.
title: Chennai 2 Bangkok
